item.title: Sam Smith & Madonna will release their new single, “Vulgar,” next Friday, June 9th.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
A Japanese court rules that the government’s policy against same-sex marriage is unconstitutional, a decision activists see as a step towards marriage equality in the country.
: https://reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-lower-court-rules-that-not-allowing-same-sex-marriage-is-unconstitutional-2023-05-30/…
item.author: popcrave

item.title: ‘Snow White and the Huntsman’ was released 11 years ago today.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: 7 years ago today, Fifth Harmony released “All In My Head (Flex)” featuring Fetty Wap.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Happy 27th birthday to the talented Normani.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Twitter is piloting a new feature that will automatically add a Community Note to all tweets featuring the same misleading image.
The feature will also be expanded to videos.
item.author: popcrave
